snippet: The French photojournalist who reports from behind rebel lines in Syria using the name Mani has produced an intimate portrait of the Free Syrian Army's Farouq Brigade fighting outside Homs.
abstract: The French photojournalist who reports from behind rebel lines in Syria using the name Mani has produced an intimate portrait of the Free Syrian Army's Farouq Brigade fighting outside Homs.

headline.main: Vivid Portrait of Syrian Rebel Fighters Outside Homs
